"Magnifier Mode":
"When you're out in the field, pressing + activates Magnifier Mode, enlarging part of the game screen to make it easier to see.

※Before you can use this feature, you must enable it from the Options menu, under Gameplay."

"In Magnifier Mode, you have the following options:

・: Scroll the screen
・: Zoom in on the screen
・ + : Exit Magnifier Mode"
